title: memes
description: if elton john covered 'sandstorm', you'd find it here. songs that transcend their musicality, intentionally overplayed anthems. silly or serious!

title: ding ding, dinnertime
description: easy listening, energizing, upbeat. a soundtrack to today's stories and tonight's schemes.

title: midday lounge
description: sun beaming, breeze blowing, hobbits sprawled across sagging inflatable couches. slow, light, groovy tunes ideal for morning chores, coffee chats and cat naps.

title: pre-event hype
description: energetic songs that invoke a sense of mystery and intrigue. rhythmic, luring, anticipatory. a sonic hypnosis that tugs on passers-by and forebodes revelation.

title: soon, sunrise
description: wow sick night we just had, let's not stop. light-emitting diodes around a light-emitting campfire. chill, lunar, downtempo beats.

title: highly danceable
description: nnn-tss-nnn-tss-nnn-tss-nnn-tss. sounds you can't help but move to. ideal for the pregame or the main event. disco, house, techno, hip-hop, trap, and bass welcome.

title: kiwi hole
description: dark, deep, sultry beats for hair-stroking and skin-caressing. a dance playlist for your fingers, a soundtrack to slow, attentive movement.
